a_question: 请帮我计算，在20210105，中信行业分类划分的一级行业为综合金融行业中，涨跌幅最大股票的股票代码是？涨跌幅是多少？百分数保留两位小数。股票涨跌幅定义为：（收盘价 - 前一日收盘价 / 前一日收盘价）* 100%。
sql:
SELECT stock_code, 
       ((close_price - LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) * 100 AS percentage_change
FROM your_table_name
WHERE trade_date = '2021-01-05'
  AND industry_first_level = '综合金融行业'
ORDER BY percentage_change DESC
LIMIT 1;

a_question: 假设股票日收益率计算公式为：日收益率 = （当日收盘价-昨收盘价）/昨收盘价。请帮我找到在2021年，申万行业分类行业划分标准,银行一级行业中, 代码为多少的股票的日均收益率最高？
sql:
SELECT stock_code, AVG((close_price - LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) AS avg_daily_return
FROM your_table_name
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trade_date) = 2021
  AND industry_first_level = '银行'
GROUP BY stock_code
ORDER BY avg_daily_return DESC
LIMIT 1;

a_question: 在2019年的中期报告里，金鹰基金管理有限公司管理的基金中，有多少比例的基金是个人投资者持有的份额超过机构投资者？希望得到一个精确到两位小数的百分比。
sql:
SELECT 
   COUNT(*) / SUM(total_funds) * 100 AS percentage
FROM 
   (SELECT 
      SUM(CASE WHEN individual_investor_holdings > institutional_investor_holdings THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS count_individual,
      SUM(CASE WHEN individual_investor_holdings > institutional_investor_holdings THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) + SUM(CASE WHEN institutional_investor_holdings > individual_investor_holdings THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_funds
   FROM 
      your_table_name
   WHERE 
      report_year = 2019
      AND fund_manager = '金鹰基金管理有限公司') subquery;

a_question: 我想了解国寿安保灵活优选混合基金,在2021年一季度的季报第6大重股。该持仓股票当个季度的涨跌幅?请四舍五入保留百分比到小数点两位。
sql:
SELECT ROUND(((close_price - LAG(close_price, 63) OVER (PARTITION BY stock_code ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price, 63) OVER (PARTITION BY stock_code ORDER BY trade_date)) * 100, 2) AS percentage_change
FROM your_table_name
WHERE stock_code = '国寿安保灵活优选混合基金'
  AND trade_date >= '2021-01-01' AND trade_date < '2021-04-01'
ORDER BY percentage_change DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT stock_code, AVG((close_price - LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) AS avg_daily_return
FROM your_table_name
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trade_date) = 2019
  AND industry_first_level = '通信'
GROUP BY stock_code
ORDER BY avg_daily_return DESC
LIMIT 1;

WHERE report_date <= '2019-03-31'

a_question: 假设股票日收益率计算公式为：日收益率 = （当日收盘价-昨收盘价）/昨收盘价。请帮我找到在2019年，中信行业分类行业划分标准,建筑一级行业中, 代码为多少的股票的日均收益率最高？
sql:
SELECT stock_code, AVG((close_price - LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) AS avg_daily_return
FROM your_table_name
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trade_date) = 2019
  AND industry_first_level = '建筑一级行业'
GROUP BY stock_code
ORDER BY avg_daily_return DESC
LIMIT 1;

GROUP BY stock_code;

a_question: 假设股票日收益率计算公式为：日收益率 = （当日收盘价-昨收盘价）/昨收盘价。请帮我找到在2020年，中信行业分类行业划分标准,非银行金融一级行业中, 代码为多少的股票的日均收益率最高？
sql:
SELECT stock_code, AVG((close_price - LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) / LAG(close_price) OVER (ORDER BY trade_date)) AS avg_daily_return
FROM your_table_name
WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM trade_date) = 2020
  AND industry_first_level = '非银行金融'
GROUP BY stock_code
ORDER BY avg_daily_return DESC
LIMIT 1;
